question: NEAT scheme, which is in news recently, is related to which field?
explanation: The Ministry of Human Resource Development (MHRD)  has decided to launch a new public-private partnership scheme - National Educational Alliance for Technology (NEAT) - using Artificial Intelligence (AI) to make learning more personalized and customized as per the learner’s requirements. The scheme is expected to begin operations by early November 2019 & aims to harness technology for better learning outcomes in higher education. The start-ups which join the government platform must offer 25% free coupons for students from disadvantaged communities.
